sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext, useState} from 'react' import '../styles/Passengerdetails.css' import flightContent from "../context/FlightContext"; const Passengerdetails = () => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({title:"",firstname:"",lastname:"",dateofbirth:"",nationality:"",gender:"",passport:"",passportexpirydate:""}) const [placeholder, setPlaceholder] = useState({"fname":"dnone", "lname":"dnone","dob":"dblock","nationality":"dnone","passport":"dnone","passportexpirydate":"dblock" }) const [height,setHeight] = useState({"fname":"ihide", "lname":"ihide","dob":"ishow","nationality":"ihide","passport":"ihide","passportexpirydate":"ishow" }) const onChangelogin = (e) => { setCredentials({ ...credentials,[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const content = useContext(flightContent) const {selectedflight ,passarray} = content console.log(passarray) return (
Passenger Details
Passenger 1 (Adult)
{localStorage.getItem('token')?:<>}
Title
First name
{ if(!e.target.value){ e.target.placeholder="" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"fname":"dblock"}) setHeight({...height,"fname":"ishow"}) } } } onBlur={(e)=> { if(e.target.value === ''){ e.target.placeholder="First name" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"fname":"dnone"}) setHeight({...height,"fname":"ihide"}) } } } placeholder='First name' onChange={onChangelogin} value={credentials.firstname} type="text" name="firstname" id="firstname"/>
Last name
{ if(!e.target.value){ e.target.placeholder="" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"lname":"dblock"}) setHeight({...height,"lname":"ishow"}) } } } onBlur={(e)=> { if(e.target.value === ''){ e.target.placeholder="Last name" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"lname":"dnone"}) setHeight({...height,"lname":"ihide"}) } } } placeholder='Last name' onChange={onChangelogin} value={credentials.lastname} type="text" name="lastname" id="lastname"/>
Date of birth
Nationality
{ if(!e.target.value){ e.target.placeholder="" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"nationality":"dblock"}) setHeight({...height,"nationality":"ishow"}) } } } onBlur={(e)=> { if(e.target.value === ''){ e.target.placeholder="Nationality" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"nationality":"dnone"}) setHeight({...height,"nationality":"ihide"}) } } } placeholder='Nationality' onChange={onChangelogin} value={credentials.nationality} type="text" name="dateofbirth" id="dateofbirth"/>
Passport Details(Optional)
{ if(!e.target.value){ e.target.placeholder="" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"passport":"dblock"}) setHeight({...height,"passport":"ishow"}) } } } onBlur={(e)=> { if(e.target.value === ''){ e.target.placeholder="Passport Details(Optional)" setPlaceholder({...placeholder,"passport":"dnone"}) setHeight({...height,"passport":"ihide"}) } } } placeholder='Passport Details(Optional)' onChange={onChangelogin} value={credentials.passport} type="text" name="passport" id="passport"/>
Passport expirydate
Your trip summary
{selectedflight.map((flight)=>{ return
Outbound flight
{flight.departuredate}
{flight.arrivaldate}
{flight.from}
{flight.departuretime}
{flight.to}
{flight.arrivaltime}
Opearted by {flight.flightname}
Total trip price:
{flight.price}
})}
) } export default Passengerdetails
